modName: Brighter Elven Armor and Weapons Mod
summary: This mod adds brighter and better looking Elven gear for male and female characters into Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[size=14][b]Brighter Elven Gear[/b][/size]

[b]Description[/b] - Adds brighter Elven gear to Skyrim for male and female characters for every Elven weapon and armor there is.

[b]IMPORTANT[/b] - Backup all of you Elven files incase you ever want them back. They can be found at these locations (Steam default):
-  [i]C:\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\Steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\Skyrim\\\\Data\\\\textures\\\\weapons\\\\elven[/i]
-  [i]C:\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\Steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\Skyrim\\\\Data\\\\textures\\\\armor\\\\elven[/i]
=======================================================================================
[b]Installation[/b] - Extract the \\\'Data\\\' file to your main Skyrim directory (Steam default: [i]C:\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\Steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\Skyrim[/i]).
=======================================================================================
[b]Compatibility[/b] - This mod will work with any other mod as long as it doesn\\\'t edit or replace the Elven textures.
=======================================================================================
[b]Credits:[/b]

Bethesda - Skyrim and it\\\'s assets
Me - Armor modifications
author: Nick1503
